column2: Reduce greenhouse gas emissions by at least 55% by 2030
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Greenhouse Gas Emissions Reduction" because it directly aims to reduce emissions.

column2: Achieve climate neutrality by 2050
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Climate Neutrality" because it sets a long-term goal for the EU to become climate neutral.

column2: Set up at least one renewables-based energy community in every municipality with a population higher than 10,000 by 2025
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Renewable Energy Communities" because it promotes the development of community-based renewable energy projects.

column2: Increase the share of renewable energy in the energy mix to at least 32% by 2030
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Renewable Energy Share" because it aims to increase the proportion of renewable energy in the overall energy mix.

column2: Improve energy efficiency by reducing energy consumption by at least 32.5% by 2030
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Energy Efficiency" because it focuses on reducing energy consumption through efficient use.

column2: Increase the share of renewable energy in heating and cooling to at least 21% by 2030
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Renewable Heating and Cooling" because it specifically targets the heating and cooling sector for renewable energy integration.

column2: Reduce greenhouse gas emissions from transport by at least 60% by 2050
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Sustainable Transport" because it aims to significantly reduce emissions from the transport sector.

column2: Deploy alternative fuels and zero-emission vehicles
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Alternative Fuels and Vehicles" because it promotes the use of alternative fuels and zero-emission vehicles for transport.

column2: Over this decade, the EU will need to install, on average, approximately 45 GW per year of PV to reach the share of 45% of energy coming from renewables set out in the REPowerEU Plan
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Solar Energy" because it specifically mentions the installation of photovoltaic (PV) capacity to meet renewable energy targets.

column2: Halve the amount of residual (non-recycled) municipal waste by 2030
column3: TA3_Industrial strategy for a clean and circular economy
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Waste Reduction" because it aims to reduce the amount of non-recycled municipal waste.

column2: Increase recycling rates to at least 65% by 2030

column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Recycling Rates" because it focuses on increasing the proportion of waste that is recycled.

column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Plastic Waste Reduction" because it specifically targets the reduction of plastic waste in oceans.

column2: Increase the use of recycled materials in production processes

column2: Improve public transport and promote walking and cycling

column2: Reduce greenhouse gas emissions from agriculture by at least 55% by 2030
